actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

official_title: A bill to provide relief for public agencies from liability under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 for failure to pay exempt employees on a salary basis, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Declares congressional policy and provides relief for public agencies from any liability (as well as from certain existing claims) under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 for failure to pay otherwise exempt employees on a salary basis.

titles.title: A bill to provide relief for public agencies from liability under the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 for failure to pay exempt employees on a salary basis, and for other purposes.
